statements: SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

SELECT * FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC

SELECT player_id, action_time, action_description FROM player_interactions ORDER BY action_time DESC;
